Articles.Content:
I am not talking about meaningless chatter, I am talking about a mod that has certain sounds for certain situations, such as beeping for docking, a certain beep for when your orbit approaches an encounter, etc etc.

They could be completely customizable so that the user could choose to, for instance, only hear beeps when his/her orbit encounters a planet.

This could be useful for when you are executing a burn and do not have the map pulled up and your vessel has an accidental encounter during a separate target transfer.

I like to know, as I burn to Jool, if I happen to encounter Duna, or the Mun during my burn. I think this feature could allow for more of a fluid, intuitive use of MJ and other mods.

You might try ASET mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925.

EDIT- It has some sound when in that pod.

You might try ASET mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925.

EDIT- It has some sound when in that pod.

I don't care if that's not what I want. That's what I want. Holy heck, thanks dude, that mod is an instant dl.
He has some nice mods there are 2 rover mods by him and he is working on a base mod.
